import React from 'react'; import { FaPlusCircle,FaFileImage,FaGift,FaPaperPlane } from "react-icons/fa"; const MessageSend = ({inputHendle,newMessage,sendMessage,emojiSend,ImageSend}) => { const emojis = [ '😀', '😃', '😄', '😁', '😆', '😅', '😂', '🤣', '😊', '😇', '🙂', '🙃', '😉', '😌', '😍', '😝', '😜', '🧐', '🤓', '😎', '😕', '🤑', '🥴', '😱' ] return (
Add Attachment
Add Image
Add gift
{ emojis.map(e => emojiSend(e)} >{e}) }
) }; export default MessageSend;
